page.title: 11LEISURE TIME - PEOPLES VIEWS
page.content: These are views of some people that were interviewed locally about their leisure time. Usually the old ladies did sewing, knitting or machining. Some liked to go out driving in their cars or have a chat, a walk and a cup of tea with their friends. Old men usually liked to sit around, smoke or go out for walks and breath the fresh air! The younger people liked to go to sports centres such as the Fairfield S.C. or visiting interesting places, or going to the two parks with their children. Mothers with young children and those with full time occupations had little leisure time except at weekends, when they could relax with their families. Some people visited the Orchard Theatre in Dartford, public houses and restaurants or led a more active life playing badminton, tennis and other sports.
